#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<string>
#include<queue>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#define pb push_back
#define big long long
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define RFOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define vi vector<int>
#define vb vector<big>
using namespace std;
big checkprime(big n)
{
    big i,count=0;
    FOR(i,2,n-1)
        if(n%i==0)
        {
            count=1;
            break;
        }
    if(count==1 || n==1)return 0;
    return 1;
}
int main() {
	big l,t,n,i,j,k,r,temp,m,x,y,z,a,b,c,sig,sum=0;
	vb v;
	big count=0;
	string s;
	cin>>t;
	
	FOR(k,1,t)
	{
	    count=0;
	    cin>>l>>r;
	 FOR(i,l,r)
	 {
	    
	    m=i;
	    sum=0;
	    while(m>0)
	    {
	        sum+=m%10;
	        m/=10;
	    }
	    //cout<<"sum,num are "<<sum<<" "<<i<<endl;
	    if(checkprime(sum)==1) count++;
	 }
	    cout<<count<<endl;
	}
    
	return 0;
}
